Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

Entry:          CodeConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a code constraint on the value's child"
Value:          CodedFromValueSet
// it's wrong to say CodedFromValueSet.concept = FOO#bar and should trigger an error
                CodedFromValueSet = FOO#bar "FooBar"

Element:        CodedFromValueSet
Value:          concept from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded (required)
